name: Time
milestones: Have highest score after max turns
victoryString: The world has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful civilizations have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The world will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Extinctions
victoryString: Life on Earth became completely extinct. The planet that once existed here was home to many powerful and diverse life forms such a protozoan, crustacean, cephalopod, fish, amphibian, reptile, mammal, bird, and some even intelligent in unique ecosystem. after all, it seems that the universe did not allow them.
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Domination
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Dawn of Civilization
victoryString: This planet has been completely conquered by humans. Humans have completely changed the look of this planet.A new biome of concrete and plastic was born,Iron Lumps are Flying there, and the land was lit up. Now human action could easily destroy the earth.
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Next Universe
victoryScreenHeader:
Complete all the Universe parts
to win!
victoryString: Humans have constructed a perfect replica of the pseudo-universe. It will be possible to observe the moment of biological development, and all the mysteries that were unknown until now will be discovered...!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!
